statements: SELECT * FROM game_assets;
SELECT asset_id, asset_name FROM game_assets WHERE asset_type = 'weapon';
SELECT asset_name, asset_type FROM game_assets WHERE asset_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT asset_id, asset_name, asset_type FROM game_assets WHERE asset_name LIKE 'Sword%';
SELECT asset_id, asset_type FROM game_assets ORDER BY asset_type ASC, asset_id DESC;
SELECT asset_name FROM game_assets WHERE asset_type = 'Character' ORDER BY asset_name ASC;
SELECT asset_name, asset_type FROM game_assets WHERE asset_type IN ('Weapon', 'Armor') ORDER BY asset_name DESC;
SELECT asset_id, asset_name, asset_type FROM game_assets WHERE asset_type = 'Item' AND asset_name LIKE '%potion%' ORDER BY asset_id;
SELECT asset_type, COUNT(*) as total_assets FROM game_assets GROUP BY asset_type HAVING COUNT(*) > 5 ORDER BY total_assets DESC;
SELECT * FROM game_assets WHERE asset_file IS NOT NULL ORDER BY asset_id ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM game_assets;
SELECT id, asset_name, asset_type FROM game_assets;
SELECT asset_name, asset_url FROM game_assets WHERE asset_type = 'weapon';
SELECT asset_name, asset_type, asset_url FROM game_assets ORDER BY asset_type DESC;
SELECT a.asset_name, am.metadata_key, am.metadata_value FROM game_assets a JOIN asset_metadata am ON a.id = am.asset_id;
SELECT * FROM game_assets WHERE asset_type = 'weapon';
SELECT id, asset_name FROM game_assets WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT asset_name, asset_url FROM game_assets ORDER BY asset_name ASC;
SELECT asset_name, asset_url FROM game_assets WHERE asset_type = 'armor' ORDER BY asset_name DESC;
SELECT ga.id, ga.asset_name, am.metadata_key, am.metadata_value FROM game_assets ga JOIN asset_metadata am ON ga.id = am.asset_id WHERE am.metadata_key = 'rarity';
SELECT * FROM Images;
SELECT image_id, image_url, image_description FROM Images WHERE asset_id = '1a6b96a7-7d2a-4c2e-a8e2-08a37a36a95b';
SELECT asset_id, asset_name FROM GameAssets WHERE asset_type = 'Character' ORDER BY asset_name DESC;
SELECT image_id, image_url, asset_id FROM Images JOIN GameAssets ON Images.asset_id = GameAssets.asset_id WHERE asset_name LIKE '%sword%';
SELECT video_id, video_url, video_duration FROM Videos WHERE video_duration > 120 ORDER BY video_duration ASC;
SELECT * FROM GameAssets;
SELECT asset_name, asset_type FROM GameAssets ORDER BY asset_name ASC;
SELECT image_url, image_description FROM Images WHERE asset_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
SELECT * FROM Videos WHERE video_duration > 60 ORDER BY video_duration DESC;
SELECT asset_id, COUNT(*) AS num_images FROM Images GROUP BY asset_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 3;
SELECT asset_name, asset_type FROM game_assets;
SELECT * FROM images WHERE image_resolution = '1080p';
SELECT sound_name, sound_duration FROM sound_files ORDER BY sound_duration DESC;
SELECT asset_name, creation_date FROM game_assets WHERE asset_type = 'background';
SELECT image_name, image_size, asset_name FROM images INNER JOIN game_assets ON images.asset_id = game_assets.asset_id;
SELECT * FROM game_assets ORDER BY creation_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT asset_name, asset_type, asset_path FROM game_assets WHERE asset_type = 'image';
SELECT video_name, video_duration, video_quality FROM videos WHERE video_quality = 'HD' ORDER BY video_duration DESC;
SELECT * FROM sound_files WHERE sound_duration > '00:02:30';

SELECT game_assets.asset_name, images.image_resolution, videos.video_quality FROM game_assets JOIN images ON game_assets.asset_id = images.asset_id JOIN videos ON game_assets.asset_id = videos.asset_id;
SELECT * FROM GameAssets;
SELECT asset_name, asset_type FROM GameAssets WHERE asset_size > 1000;
SELECT asset_name, asset_size FROM GameAssets ORDER BY asset_size DESC;
SELECT * FROM GameDevelopers WHERE developer_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT asset_name, asset_type, asset_size FROM GameAssets JOIN DeveloperAssets ON GameAssets.asset_id = DeveloperAssets.asset_id;
SELECT asset_name, asset_type FROM GameAssets ORDER BY asset_type ASC, asset_name DESC;
SELECT attribute_name, attribute_description FROM GameAttributes WHERE LENGTH(attribute_description) > 50 ORDER BY attribute_name;
SELECT developer_name, developer_email FROM GameDevelopers WHERE developer_email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT asset_name, asset_size FROM GameAssets WHERE asset_type='video' ORDER BY asset_size DESC;
SELECT asset_name, review_rating, review_comment FROM GameAssets INNER JOIN GameReviews ON GameAssets.asset_id = GameReviews.asset_id WHERE review_rating = 5;
